Introduction

What Wintel do ?

  1. Wintel Team will recover All Linux systems

Make sure you are on the DR host, not the production server ( don't do tickets in parallel / be extremly careful )

  2. Precision Systems Disaster Recovery test FDC -- Linux recovery instructions
